tool.name: PCA
tool.help:
This tool performs a pricipal component analysis and plots the results.
**Options**
**Colour by group** - colours the observations by group based on the given grouping factor.
**Scale by standard deviation** - scales the data by standard deviation. Useful if data is unscaled to remove the bias introduced by variable magnitude differences.
**Principal component pairs** - specifies which principal component (PC) pairs to plot. Pairs are specified by comma separated list of pairs of numbers. Each pair of numbers is separated by comma.
'''EXAMPLE'''
1-3,2-6,1,7 - will plot 3 sets of plots: PC1 vs PC3, PC2 vs PC6 and PC1 vs PC7.
